tool_description: Share your screen on desktop computers without installing any software. View screen sharing from any device (PC, Mobile) with a browser without installing any software. You can expect low-latency screen sharing. Provide collaborate annotation tool and various resolution plans.
name: Share Screens
title: Share Screens

api_list.name: Create new screen share
api_list.description: Creates a new screen share and returns the publisher and viewer JSON object.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://share-screens.p.rapidapi.com/genmeetingid"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "share-screens.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://share-screens.p.rapidapi.com/genmeetingid"

headers = {

print(response.json())
